body_html:
adding more threads:

  • https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls-torch-only/7864
  • https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls/7736

looking into this now. it's kinda weird because we dont have any static TLS in the whole lib (except for OpenMP's 8 bytes) as far as I investigated.

body:
adding more threads: 
- https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls-torch-only/7864
- https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls/7736

looking into this now. it's kinda weird because we dont have any static TLS in the whole lib (except for OpenMP's 8 bytes) as far as I investigated.
